param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

df = inputs[0]
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

df = df.loc[
  ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,4,1)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,4,6)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,7,12)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,7,13)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,5)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,11,9)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,17)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,12,2)))
]
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype('str')

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd

df = inputs[0]

df.set_index(pd.to_datetime(df['datetime']), inplace=True)
df_1h = df.resample(rule='1H').mean()
df_1h = df_1h.reset_index()
df_1h['datetime'] = df_1h['datetime'].astype(str)

#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
df = inputs[0]
df['_datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])
df['month'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.month)
df['day'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.day)
df['hour'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.hour)
df = df.drop(columns=['_datetime'])

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import numpy as np

# Define NMAE loss function
def NMAE(observed, pred, nominal):
    absolute_error = np.abs(observed - pred)
    absolute_error /= nominal
    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

    return 100 * absolute_error[target_idx].mean()
  
  
df = inputs[0]

err = NMAE(df['target'].values, df['prediction'].values, 1100)

    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

display.label: Filter: 14시 예보 자료만 사용

guide.message: Set data options using Chart Setting Button.
Set data options using Chart Setting Button.

display.description:
17시 기준으로 예측해야 하므로, 전날 14시 예보자료만 사용한다. 

forecast는 '몇시간 뒤'를 예측하는지에 대한 자료이므로, 10 (14+10=24시) ~ 33 (14+33=23시) 를 사용한다.

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
df = inputs[0]

import pandas as pd
df['forecast_time_'] = pd.to_datetime(df['forecast_time'])
df['datetime'] = df['forecast_time_'] + df['forecast'].map(lambda x: pd.DateOffset(hours=x))
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype(str)
df.drop(columns=['forecast_time_'], inplace=True)

guide.message: Set data options using Chart Setting Button.
Set data options using Chart Setting Button.

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd
df = inputs[0]
#df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])
datetime_from = df['datetime'][0]
datetime_to = df['datetime'].values[-1]

every_hour = pd.DataFrame(pd.date_range(start=datetime_from, end=datetime_to, freq='H'), columns=['datetime'])
every_hour['datetime'] = every_hour['datetime'].astype('str')


every_hour = pd.merge(every_hour, df, on='datetime', how='outer')
every_hour['forecast_time'] = every_hour['forecast_time'].ffill()
every_hour["temperature"] = every_hour["temperature"].interpolate()
every_hour["humidity"] = every_hour["humidity"].interpolate()
every_hour["windspeed"] = every_hour["windspeed"].interpolate()
every_hour["winddirection"] = every_hour["winddirection"].interpolate()
